data.title: Carmelo Anthony Player Profile, Los Angeles Lakers
data.meta_description: Get the latest news, stats and more about Carmelo Anthony on RealGM.com
data.text: Jun 26, 2003 - The Denver Nuggets selected Carmelo Anthony in Round 1 with Pick 3 in the 2003 NBA Draft. Jul 17, 2003 - Carmelo Anthony signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets. Oct 28, 2005 - The Denver Nuggets exercised their Team Option to extend the contract of Carmelo Anthony. Jul 13, 2006 - Carmelo Anthony signed a rookie scale extension with the Denver Nuggets. Feb 22, 2011 - Carmelo Anthony voided his ability to terminate his contract early. Feb 22, 2011 - Carmelo Anthony signed a veteran extension with the Denver Nuggets. Feb 22, 2011 - Carmelo Anthony was acquired by the New York Knicks, along with Renaldo Balkman, Chauncey Billups, Corey Brewer, Anthony Carter and Shelden Williams, from the Denver Nuggets in exchange for Wilson Chandler, Eddy Curry, Raymond Felton, Danilo Gallinari, Timofey Mozgov, Anthony Randolph, a 2012 2nd round pick (GOS own), a 2013 2nd round pick (GOS own), a 2014 1st round pick (NYK own), a Swap 2016 1st round picks and cash. Jun 22, 2014 - Carmelo Anthony exercised an Early Termination Option to void the remaining seasons on his contract. Jul 1, 2014 - Carmelo Anthony, previously with the New York Knicks, became a free agent. Jul 14, 2014 - Carmelo Anthony signed a multi-year contract with the New York Knicks. Sep 25, 2017 - Carmelo Anthony was acquired by the Oklahoma City Thunder from the New York Knicks in exchange for Enes Freedom, Doug McDermott and a 2018 2nd round pick (CHI own). Jul 25, 2018 - Carmelo Anthony was acquired by the Atlanta Hawks, along with Justin Anderson and a conditional 2022 1st round pick (OKC own), from the Oklahoma City Thunder in exchange for Mike Muscala and Dennis Schroder. Jul 30, 2018 - The Atlanta Hawks placed the contract of Carmelo Anthony on waivers. Aug 1, 2018 - Carmelo Anthony, previously with the Atlanta Hawks, became a free agent. Aug 13, 2018 - Carmelo Anthony signed a contract with the Houston Rockets. Jan 22, 2019 - Carmelo Anthony was acquired by the Chicago Bulls, along with the draft rights to Jon Diebler and cash, from the Houston Rockets in exchange for the draft rights to Tadija Dragicevic. Feb 1, 2019 - The Chicago Bulls placed the contract of Carmelo Anthony on waivers. Feb 3, 2019 - Carmelo Anthony, previously with the Chicago Bulls, became a free agent. Nov 19, 2019 - Carmelo Anthony signed a contract with the Portland Trail Blazers. Nov 21, 2020 - Carmelo Anthony, previously with the Portland Trail Blazers, became a free agent. Nov 21, 2020 - Carmelo Anthony signed a contract with the Portland Trail Blazers. Aug 3, 2021 - Carmelo Anthony, previously with the Portland Trail Blazers, became a free agent. Aug 6, 2021 - Carmelo Anthony signed a contract with the Los Angeles Lakers.
